name: webcube-projects
description: Continuously updated JS infrastructure for modern web dev

scripts.update: npm run clear:deps && yarn install && lerna run prepare && echo 6.0 > .project-version
scripts.upgrade: npm run clear:lock && npm run update
scripts.clear:deps: lerna clean --yes 2>/dev/null || true && rm -rf ./node_modules yarn-error.log lerna-debug.log 2>/dev/null || true && lerna exec --bail=false -- rm yarn.lock package-lock.json yarn-error.log 2>/dev/null || true && rm .git/hooks/pre-commit 2>/dev/null || true
